analytic.title: A letter from the Rev. Dr. Samuel Clarke to Mr. Benjamin Hoadly, F. R. S. occasion'd by the present controversy among mathematicians, concerning the proportion of velocity and force in bodies in motion

monogr.title: Philosophical Transactions giving some Account of the Undertakings, Studies, and Labours of the Ingenious, in many considerable Parts of the World
